thread.title: Motivating compression sleeves Ion Motivators releases new Motivational Performance Compression SleevesWorn by Pro Athletes
thread.title_full: Motivating compression sleeves Ion Motivators releases new Motivational Performance Compression SleevesWorn by Pro Athletes | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Motivating compression sleeves Ion Motivators releases new Motivational Performance Compression SleevesWorn by Pro Athletes
text:
(MENAFN Press) Leading performance athletic accessories innovator launches new compression sleeves designed to motivate users to help them achieve their goals
Poughkeepsie NY - Ion Motivators a pioneer in the performance technology sports accessories market has announced a new turn in their product combined with the official acclamation by famous athletes and celebrities in the industry. The Ion Motivators Compression Sleeves are a new sensation which are motivating many to elevate. In addition to performance benefits they are designed to motivate everyone. Ion Motivator’s compression sleeves provide a continuous motivational reminder message to boost those wearing into winning whatever they long to achieve with positive confirmation.
Owner of Ion Motivators Shawn Scianna said “Our products are motivational and trusted by professional athletes. Available in many colors and styles more athletes wear our products than our competitors. Our compression sleeves can also be worn to provide motivation to help improve circulation keep the arm warm and loose to maximize performance while giving the constant motivational message.   They are also used for better muscle recovery to reduce the chance of soreness.  They are made with a great design and perfect fitting which increases comfort and reduces the chance of the sleeve sliding down your arm while retaining shape to allow for freedom of movement. They are ideal for all sports training and physical activities. They can also be worn in almost all weather conditions providing warmth when needed while also providing excellent UPF sun protection.  They are made with an antibacterial mix of 80% polyester / 20% lycra spandex. Continual motivation on your sleeves at all times.”
Some of the top NFL and NBA athletes which includes Dez Bryant of the Dallas Cowboys and Darrelle Revis of the NY Jets and many others wear Ion Motivator products. Everyday folks can wear Ion Motivators products to motivate them to start off their new exercise program and help them to achieve amazing results in short time.
Following is what some of their happy buyers have to say about the motivational compression sleeves:
A verified buyer Tom Peters said “My favorite football player wears them so I also wanted to give them a shot. LOVE LOVE LOVE them. I am going to purchase another color soon. They are worth the purchase and whenever I go to the gym or play football I wear them and they motivate me a lot. My favorite saying is NEVER GIVE UP”
Another happy and loyal buyer William Anthony exclaimed with joy “Woah I can’t tell you how satisfied and happy I am to found this company. I was totally doubtful since I had never used these sleeves before but they have actually inspired me and I started working out just because of them.”
Ion Motivators Inc. donates a portion of all sales to Have a Heart Children’s Cancer Society. Scianna stated “We intend to gain exposure to help increase donations to the charity we work with.”
Ion Motivator products are very sporty inspiring and fashionably bold and can help you stay competitive.
For more information about Ion Motivators products including Motivational Compression Sleeves and matching Motivational Wristbands please visit: http://www.ionmotivators.com.
To purchase the motivational compression sleeves visit.
